Quotes.quote: The way I see it,if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain
Quotes.author: Dolly Patron

Quotes.quote: If your ship doesn't come in, swim out to it
Quotes.author: Jonathan Winters

Quotes.quote: When you get tired, learn to rest, Not quit
Quotes.author: Ramsey

Quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy
Quotes.author: Dalai Lama

Quotes.quote: You only live once but if you do it right, once is enough
Quotes.author: Mae West

Quotes.quote: The only way to find your voice is to use it
Quotes.author: Jen Mueller

Quotes.quote: Fear kills all dreams than failure ever will
Quotes.author: Suzzy Kaseem

Quotes.quote: Start where you are, use what you have, Do what you can
Quotes.author: Arthur ashe

Quotes.quote: Inorder to write about life, first you must live it
Quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway
